Package savers

Class DataSaver_Sparse

  • java.lang.Object
    • savers.DataSaver_Sparse
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IDataSaver
    public class DataSaver_Sparse
extends java.lang.Object
implements IDataSaver
    Saver for sparse game information. Basically this includes actions needed to recreate a run, but not full state information at every timestep.
    Author:
    matt
